name: Ultratank
description: Aliens attacked the ground! Modern weapons are used against them, including tanks. The main problem of tanks is low speed. Therefore, you play for Ultratank, which has jet engines and can move with great speed. Your task is to drive as far as possible avoiding collisions with traffic, avoid beams of aliens who immediately destroy the tank, collect fuel and other bonuses. The speed gradually increases. Therefore, it becomes increasingly difficult to react with time.
